title: Virtual Logo Typeface ID
content:
I’m continuing the enrichment of my typeface arsenal.

Can anyone identify the typeface used in this logo?

Many thanks in advance!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [virtual logo.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20080913040228/http:/typophile.com/files/virtual%20logo.png) | 7.38 KB |

 [‹ Help on this one appreciated](http://web.archive.org/web/20080913040228/http:/typophile.com/node/48783 "Go to previous forum topic") [Very thin geometric Bauhaus-like sans "bc" with exagerated 3D shadow ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080913040228/http:/typophile.com/node/48797 "Go to next forum topic")
author: bjk

comments.content: Perhaps a modified Klavika? Rounded the edges a bit?
Actually it’s probably not Klavika. Hmm??
Neo Sans, but modified. Tops of ‘S’ and ‘G’ look rounder in the sample. The odd ‘t’ is a sure giveaway tho.
I think the differences in the ’S’ and ’G’ may be due to hinting/antialiasing, not modification.
